title: My PC just restarted itself while im playing a normal game...
body: After waiting through the loading screen and about 20sec of in game movement.. F*cking Windows 10 just restarts itself without warning and started a very long update! can my team still remake after that??

replies.body:
Your team can [/Remake](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) a match if you haven't connected and/or are marked *inactive* by the system for 90 or more seconds within the first 3 minutes. It really sucks when a forced update happens in the middle of something important, so I recommend shutting down or restarting your PC once a day to allow updates to install.

Let me know if you have any questions.
